data.title: MCE Buddy see Channels DVR Files but doesn't do anything with them
data.meta_description: MCE Buddy sees the files.  It is just not doing anything with them.  Full disclosure, I am new to MCE Buddy.  I didn’t get a hit on my particular issue when I did a search.  Any guidance would be appreciated.  I have the…
data.text:
MCE Buddy sees the files. It is just not doing anything with them. Full disclosure, I am new to MCE Buddy. I didn’t get a hit on my particular issue when I did a search. Any guidance would be appreciated. I have the paid version of the program. Please see an excerpt of the logs below.

1-04-28T17:33:33 MCEBuddy.Engine.QueueManager --> Show >How the Universe Works<, checking for showname filter >< 2021-04-28T17:33:33 MCEBuddy.Engine.QueueManager --> Network ><, checking for network/channel filter >< 2021-04-28T17:33:33 MCEBuddy.Engine.QueueManager --> IsSports >False<, IsMovie >False<, checking for show type filter >Sports< WARNING> 2021-04-28T17:33:33 INFORMATION> 2021-04-28T17:36:51 MCEBuddy.Engine.Core --> MCEBuddy engine stopped INFORMATION> 2021-04-28T17:36:51 MCEBuddy.Engine.Core --> Setting engine last running state to stop

That seems to be skipping the recording because your conversion task advanced settings are set to process only sports shows, and this show is not a sports show.

Also, towards the end, it looks like shows were still being recorded and it was waiting at least 3 minutes after the show stopped recording to start processing.

I hope that might help. If not, I’ll have to defer to @Goose to decode the logs with you.
